goal.core.agent

Class Process

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.agent.Process

  • public class Process
extends java.lang.Object
    Drives the Controller and provides functionality to stop and start the controller from running. The class will start a new thread that will call Controller.run(). This class also provides functionality to retrieve any exceptions thrown while running the controller.
    Author:
    M.P. Korstanje

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Process(Controller controller)
      Creates a new Process for a Controller.

        public void awaitTermination()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException

        java.lang.InterruptedException - when interrupted while waiting

      • awaitTermination

        public void awaitTermination(long timeout,
                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Awaits the termination of this process.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to wait in timeUnit
        timeUnit - for time to wait.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when interrupted while waiting

      • getUncaughtThrowable

        public java.lang.Throwable getUncaughtThrowable()
        Returns any uncaught exception thrown while driving the Controller. Note that this value is cleared every time this Process is started.
        Returns:
        any uncaught exception or null when none were thrown.

      • isDisposedOnTermination

        public boolean isDisposedOnTermination()
        The agent can be disposed after its process terminates. This releases any resources held by the agent which can increase performance in systems with many ephemeral agents. By default the agent is not disposed.
        Returns:
        true if the agent will be disposed after it terminates.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns true if the process has been started and is running.
        Returns:
        true if the process has been started and is running.

      • setDisposeOnTermination

        public void setDisposeOnTermination(boolean disposeOnTermination)
        The agent can be disposed after its process terminates. This releases any resources held by the agent which can increase performance in systems with many ephemeral agents. By default the agent is not disposed.
        Parameters:
        disposeOnTermination - true if the agent should be disposed on termination.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts this Process.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops this process.
